About.title: The Artisan and the Material
About.p1: Passionate about the play of light and transparency, I perpetuate the ancestral art of stained glass by combining traditional techniques with contemporary vision.
About.p2: Each project is a unique adventure, whether restoring sacred heritage or creating a modern piece for a designer interior. I work with glass, lead, grisaille, and enamels with the rigor of master glassmakers.
About.p3: My workshop is a place of experimentation and creation, where each color is carefully chosen to tell a story, your story.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.intro: For any creation request, restoration, or to visit the workshop, do not hesitate to contact me.
